items.sentence: I\'d like to speak with whoever is in charge here.
Did Tom say he didn\'t think we needed to do that?
I\'m pretty sure that that wasn\'t what Tom meant.
We just want to know whether Tom is coming or not.
I think that we need to be a little more discreet.
There\'s a very good chance that Tom will do that.
There\'s plenty of whipped cream left in the bowl.
Tom has made up his mind to go to Boston to study.
How did you find out Tom didn\'t enjoy doing that?
I\'m not going because I don\'t have enough money.
